subject: Rugby (Game)
lead_paragraph: The defending champion South Africa dazzled in a 49-3 win over Fiji, while Australia’s vaunted backs were smothered in a 15-6 defeat to an impassioned Ireland team in the Rugby World Cup’s first major upset.
snippet: The defending champion South Africa dazzled in a 49-3 win over Fiji, while Australia’s vaunted backs were smothered in a 15-6 defeat to an impassioned Ireland team in the Rugby World Cup’s first major upset.
